topics.body:
Guys, this shall be my last post for a while.
I'm at the airport going to college right now so I won't be seeing you guys for a few weeks at least.

I literally have nothing to say other than to EHAN in which I have never watched Nichijou even though you told me, and to Sideward that lamia meat probably is best baked in aluminium wrap and in an oven with seasoning. Uc9, I don't like bunny girls, trashboat, I still do not know what your avatar is and Carcass, you are a weird but cool person. Mostly weird.

So yeah, goodbye.

I
